snippet: A prominent Pakistani militant commander was killed in an American drone strike at a house in North Waziristan.
abstract: Pakistani militant commander Badar Mansoor, known for his purported ties to the terrorist groups Tehriki-i-Taliban and Al Qaeda, is killed in an American drone strike in North Waziristan, Pakistan; strike comes as fraught relations between Pakistan and the United States, which had been virtually frozen since disputed border attack in November 2011, have been slowly warming.

byline.original: By ISMAIL KHAN and DECLAN WALSH
byline.contributor: Ismail Khan reported from Peshawar, and Declan Walsh from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: A prominent Pakistani militant commander was killed in an American drone strike at a house in North Waziristan.

headline.main: Drone Kills Pakistani Militant, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Drone Kills Pakistani Militant, Official Says
